articles.title: NASA’s James Webb Celebrates One Year of Science Discoveries - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope recently celebrated its first year in operation. Since then, it has produced highly colorful, detailed images and helped researchers make several new scientific discoveries.
articles.content: The James Webb Space Telescope recently celebrated its first year in operation. During that time, the orbiting observatory operated by the American space agency NASA produced colorful, detailed image… [+4384 chars]

articles.author: Brian Koberlein, Universe Today
articles.title: "Super-Earths" Study Reveals Weird New Oceans With Potential for Life - Inverse
articles.description: Earth-type and icy moons are what we know best, but these worlds outweigh them by far. But some may be melted water from exotic ices.
articles.content: Its easy to think of Earth as a water world, with its vast oceans and beautiful lakes, but compared to many worlds, Earth is particularly wet. Even the icy moons of Jupiter and Saturn have far more l… [+3821 chars]
